Member Function Documentation

BtRequestState BtBppSndAbortReqRequest::ChangeRequestState (  BOOLEAN  success  )  [virtual]
 

Sets the new state depending on the success.

ChangeRequestState is a function that is used by the ExecuteRequest and the EvaluateMessageResult functions to do the change of the request state. Depending on the current state and the passed in success, this function sets the right new state. The passed in success parameter can be on the one hand the result of a function call, on the other hand the result parameter of a message sent up to the request by the apropriate controller.

Parameters:
success A BOOLEAN indicating the success of the operation execution stage corresponding to the current state.
Returns:
A BtRequestState containing the new request state after doing the state transition.

Reimplemented from BtBppReq.

BOOLEAN BtBppSndAbortReqRequest::Execute (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Set controller parameters and call controller function.

The Execute member function is responsible for setting the appropriate parameters and perform the call to the controllers function, that executes the requested operation at the Bluetooth Stack. This function is pure virtual because each request is exectued in a different way and this has to be implemented by the concrete Bt...Request class.

Returns:
TRUE: The setup of the stack parameters was successfull and the Bluetooth stack accepted the requested operation.
FALSE: Either the setup of the stack parameters failed or the Bluetooth stack rejected the requested operation.

Implements BtRequest.

void BtBppSndAbortReqRequest::ExecutionCallback (  BtResultCode  result  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Reimplemented from BtServiceRequest.

BtRequestType BtBppSndAbortReqRequest::GetRequestType (   )  const [virtual]
 

Get type of this request.

The runtime type information feature is not supported by all compilers which this framework is used with. So a rudimentary type information system is implemnted by this class. Each type of request that has no subtypes (leaf class) must return an unique type identifier. GetRuestType return this type idenifier which is implemented as an enumeration type.

Returns:
A BtRequestType containing the type that describes this request.

Implements BtRequest.

BtDevice BtBppSndAbortReqRequest::GetTargetDevice (   )  const
 

void BtBppSndAbortReqRequest::SetRequestState (  BtRequestState  request_state  )  [virtual]
 

Set processing state of this request.

A request can be seen as it goes through several stages in its execution process. SetRequestState can be used to set the current stage of execution. When the passed in state is other than the current state the OnRequestStateChange callback function will be invoked.

Parameters:
request_state A BtRequestState containing the current stage of exection which has to be set for this request.

Reimplemented from BtBppReq.
